issue.title: [C++] AVX512 part for SIMD operations of DecodeSpaced/EncodeSpaced
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8579](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8579). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As part of https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/PARQUET-1841, AVX512 path identified with the helper of mask_compress_/mask_expand_  API.

This Jira created for spaced benchmark, unittest and AVX512 path and other basic support of further potential SIMD chance of SSE/AVX2.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8579?focusedCommentId=17176077) by Frank Du (frank.du):*
No need now. The typical 0.01% is optimized  by <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/7531> already.
